reviews.name: Dixon My First Ticonderoga Woodcase Pencil, HB #2 - Yellow Barrel, 12 count
reviews.reviewText: these pencils are SO hard to find and the ones that we found in a few stores are expensive. walmart always had great deals and has really prepares my daughter for pre-k. these are great pencils at an awesome price.
reviews.title: wonderful pencils for beginners

reviews.name: Dixon My First Ticonderoga Woodcase Pencil, HB #2 - Yellow Barrel, 12 count
reviews.reviewText: These pencils were purchased for a 4 year old homeschooler. He did not need adaptive pencil grips due to the size, weight and shape of the pencil. Most people don't understand but learning the gradual stages of pencil grasp patterns are more complex than we realize. Shipping was expected to arrive in 4 business days came 2 days after order was placed so thanks Wal-Mart. Just some tips as you clearly must be buying for a toddler/preschooler lol . Have patience, you do not want your child to pair your frustration with learning. And everyone learns differently try adaptive pencil grips or play doh.
reviews.title: Excellent teaching instrment.

reviews.name: Dixon My First Ticonderoga Woodcase Pencil, HB #2 - Yellow Barrel, 12 count
reviews.reviewText: Fits well in little hands. The thicker lead point on these pencils is harder to break than regular pencils, which is really good because kids usually press down kind of hard when learning to write. I like the bigger eraser also, comes in handy.. Beginners tend to make lots of mistakes. Hope his helps! Highly recommend these for beginners.
reviews.title: Great for beginners!!

reviews.name: Dixon My First Ticonderoga Woodcase Pencil, HB #2 - Yellow Barrel, 12 count
reviews.reviewText:
Excellent product. Came on time.
It was ordered by my kid teacher and it works good so far.
reviews.title: 06 September 2013

reviews.name: Dixon My First Ticonderoga Woodcase Pencil, HB #2 - Yellow Barrel, 12 count
reviews.reviewText: A must have of you have a pre-K ... will be ordering more
reviews.title: very happy with product
